main event: A private citizen reported observing an unidentified flying object near Reliance, Wyoming on May 12, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as being oval in shape, approximately 30 feet in diameter, and emitting a bright reddish-orange glow.
The witness stated that the object hovered for several minutes and then accelerated straight up at a very high rate of speed, disappearing from sight.
An investigation was conducted by personnel from Lowry Air Force Base, Colorado, but no evidence was found to substantiate the report.
The incident is classified as 'Unidentified', and the United States Air Force is unable to provide a positive identification or explanation for the object observed.
The Air Force requested any additional information concerning this incident to be forwarded to their office for further evaluation.
sighted object: oval-shaped object, approximately 30 feet in diameter, emitting a bright reddish-orange glow
